DataElement.preferredName: Alcoholic Beverage Past 30 Days Quantity Five Or More Daily Use Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value that represents the number of days, in the past 30 days, a person had 5 or more drinks per day.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Alcoholic Beverage Past 30 Days Quantity Five Or More Daily Use
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A drink, including beer, wine or liquor, that is made by fermentation of raw materials. An alcoholic beverage contains ethanol (alcohol) as the active ingredient._A period of time consisting of the 30 days before the present._How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number._A natural number greater than 4 and less than 6 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of four and one._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._Greater in size, amount, extent, or degree._Occurring or done each day._A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A drink, including beer, wine or liquor, that is made by fermentation of raw materials. An alcoholic beverage contains ethanol (alcohol) as the active ingredient. Alcoholic beverage is a known human carcinogen.

Concepts.definition: A drink, including beer, wine or liquor, that is made by fermentation of raw materials. An alcoholic beverage contains ethanol (alcohol) as the active ingredient.

Property.preferredName: Past 30 Days Quantity Five Or More Daily Use
Property.preferredDefinition: A period of time consisting of the 30 days before the present.:How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number.:A natural number greater than 4 and less than 6 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of four and one.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:Greater in size, amount, extent, or degree.:Occurring or done each day.:A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.

Concepts.definition: A period of time consisting of the 30 days before the present.
How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number.
A natural number greater than 4 and less than 6 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of four and one.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
Greater in size, amount, extent, or degree.
A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The average number of alcoholic drinks consumed by the participant.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Observations and activities relating to behavior, such as smoking and ETOH use.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A symbol or string of symbols expressing value, quantity, or identification. (NCI)

Concepts.definition: A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Enter the number of days you
